channel.title: Hosting from webserver
channel.description:
Before I start I will say; I have searched for this already on these forums as well as on Google so don't just say "...search for it"
anyway!!! I have a simple question to ask: is it possible and if so how, to host a server via a webhost (like hyperphp or something like that) for instance, I've got an account with a webserver were I host one website as well as a subdomain. I have 5gb of storage and unlimited bandwidth so I estimate that that will be more than enough.
If I upload my server files how would I go about running the server etc.

item.title: Hosting from webserver
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

vpsland.com

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting from webserver
item.dc:creator: @jis2507 jis2507
item.description:
@jis2507 wrote:

Ok. Thx for all your responses.
I found a thread on how to host a server via an iTouch (works same on iPhone)
so I tried hosting it on my iPhone and I can only have lyk 10 people on my server at a time. Lol
it chews up so much memory. Plus I have to empty cache like every 2days.
So how do I get a VPS??

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting from webserver
item.dc:creator: @h4x0r88 h4x0r88
item.description:
@h4x0r88 wrote:

[quote=“jis2507, post:1, topic:294883”]Before I start I will say; I have searched for this already on these forums as well as on Google so don’t just say “…search for it”

anyway!!!
I have a simple question to ask:
is it possible and if so how, to host a server via a webhost (like hyperphp or something like that)
for instance, I’ve got an account with a webserver were I host one website as well as a subdomain.
I have 5gb of storage and unlimited bandwidth so I estimate that that will be more than enough.

If I upload my server files how would I go about running the server etc.[/quote]its possible, though it would take a while to perfect.
you would only be able to run half your server on the webhoster though…
you could get a device (such as a high gb iphone) to host the server while every save.txt file gets uploaded to your webhost ETC.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting from webserver
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You can’t run your server from a webhost.

Get a VPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting from webserver
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2 kid2kewl2
item.description:
@kid2kewl2 wrote:

I would think you could, but i don’t know how.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

You have to use a vps or a dedicated server.

Read full topic
